Hero.tagline: Information System Student at Binus University | System and Data Enthusiast

About.title: About Me
About.description:
I am an Information Systems student who has been interested in computers since I was young. I started to use computers a lot when I was in elementary school, and I later studied Software Engineering at SMK Telkom Purwokerto, where I learned basic programming.

At first, coding felt challenging, but over time I found it interesting because it requires logical thinking. I enjoy the process of solving problems and feel satisfied when the code finally works. I mainly use Python and Java, and I have also learned C#, PHP, and Flutter at a basic level.

Besides coding, I enjoy analyzing problems, thinking about system flows, and writing reports or documentation. I am quite familiar with SQL querying using MySQL for managing and analyzing data. When working on tasks, I am usually calm and detail oriented. I may work a bit slowly because I focus on details, but I try to make sure the results are accurate.

I learn new things quite quickly and can adapt to different people and environments. I am more quiet and observant, which helps me stay focused and responsible in my work. I am interested in System Analyst and Data Analyst roles, but I am also open to opportunities in programming.

I am looking for a collaborative and structured environment where I can continue learning and growing. I believe in working quietly and letting the results speak for themselves.

kirimcepat.title: KirimCepat Performance Dashboard
kirimcepat.description: An interactive dashboard for analyzing logistics performance, revenue trends, and operational metrics utilizing Microsoft Excel features.
kirimcepat.details: This project presents an interactive Excel dashboard built to visualize the monthly performance of KirimCepat's local delivery fleet. The dashboard was developed using PivotTable, PivotChart, Slicer, Sparkline, and Conditional Formatting to support operational monitoring and decision-making.
kirimcepat.tech: Microsoft Excel, PivotTable, PivotChart, Slicer (Area & Month filter), Sparkline (Revenue & Shipment trends), Conditional Formatting (Performance indicators), Insight Textbox for business interpretation

digitalclinic.title: Digital Clinic Registration System Design
digitalclinic.description: System analysis and design project for an online patient registration system, including Flowchart, DFD Level 0, Use Case, Activity, and Sequence Diagrams to support digital healthcare services.
digitalclinic.details:
Business Requirements Highlights:
• Online registration for new and existing patients
• Doctor schedule selection
• WhatsApp/email notification for confirmation and schedule changes
• Online registration proof generation
• Queue number assignment based on registration order
• Different re-registration flows for BPJS and non-BPJS patients
digitalclinic.tech: System Analysis, Flowchart, DFD Level 0, Use Case Diagram, Activity Diagram, Sequence Diagram
